company: DHL Supply Chain India Pvt. Ltd.

details.title: MAWM Active
details.description: Configuration of MAWM Active project. EDI mapping and designing of API functional flows. Delivered successful SIT and UAT training programs ensuring smooth user adoption by DC operations team.

details.title: Analytics
details.description: Implemented KPI dashboards (leveraging company SaaS platform) for enhanced visibility and data-driven decision making. Created insightful reports using IBM Cognos for comprehensive supply chain analysis. Developed dynamic dashboards on Power BI to facilitate real-time performance monitoring.

details.title: OS migration
details.description: Successfully managed the complete end-to-end UAT of WMOS 2017 during the RHEL 8 Linux OS upgrade project, ensuring a smooth transition. (delivered in 75 days)

company: DHL Supply Chain India Pvt. Ltd.

details.title: WMOS 2017
details.description: Led team in implementing WMS for a leading multinational footwear brand's omnichannel operations. Oversaw the entire UAT process, ensuring smooth system integration with marketplaces.

details.title: Post Go-live support
details.description: Designed solutions for inventory optimization after system launch. Negotiated and delivered optimal solutions based on customer technical team requirements.

details.title: Customer & Operational Support
details.description: Addressed customer and operational needs related to printing, inventory reporting, and process improvement. Ensured customer satisfaction by consistently delivering optimal solutions.

company: DHL Supply Chain India Pvt. Ltd.

details.title: Comprehensive Warehouse Business Analysis
details.description: Conducted a deep dive into warehouse operations, analyzing IT, transportation, and operational processes. Presented findings to senior leadership (Board of Vice Presidents).

details.title: WMS Configuration
details.description: Successfully configured a retail cosmetics business unit in WMOS 2017 (QA environment) after thoroughly studying the production environment. Demonstrated proficiency in WMS configuration.
Storaku an e- commerce company specializing in pop culture merchandising.
Secured funding and resources to drive business growth. Actively participated in generating product ideas and overseeing website development.
Managed intern tasks and optimized operational logistics for efficient business operations.

Conducted a metallurgical study on 310MoLN tubes at elevated temperatures, systematically analyzing microstructural changes and carbon corrosion. The primary objective of this study was to ascertain the optimum working temperature of these tubes within the context of a urea plant.

Developed an Impact Test Exemption Calculator utilizing VBA and referencing ASME standards. This innovative tool significantly streamlined the process of determining exemption factors, resulting in a remarkable 70% reduction in decision-making time.
Management of a DISH seminar and underwent welding training.
Modeling and drafting of material handling equipment on CREO 2.0
Served as an assistant in destructive testing and analysis of materials for quality assurance purposes using Hypermesh.
